verses.name: Numbers 33:42
verses.text: And they departed from Zalmonah, and pitched in Punon.

verses.name: Numbers 33:43
verses.text: And they departed from Punon, and pitched in Oboth.

verses.name: Numbers 33:44
verses.text: And they departed from Oboth, and pitched in Ije–abarim, in the border of Moab.

verses.name: Numbers 33:45
verses.text: And they departed from Iim, and pitched in Dibon–gad.

verses.name: Numbers 33:46
verses.text: And they removed from Dibon–gad, and encamped in Almon–diblathaim.

verses.name: Numbers 33:47
verses.text: And they removed from Almon–diblathaim, and pitched in the mountains of Abarim, before Nebo.

verses.name: Numbers 33:48
verses.text: And they departed from the mountains of Abarim, and pitched in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho.

verses.name: Numbers 33:49
verses.text: And they pitched by Jordan, from Beth–jesimoth even unto Abel–shittim in the plains of Moab.
